body: My fucking god I totally forgot that this ended up turning into a harem… FFs can’t we go back to the pure vanilla romance days, fuck these harems dude.
This is bad , i prefer the main vanilla shit with only rena a d hiro

go fuck yourself saying it was too late to ask if it was okay when he literally already asked you if it was okay because he didnt actually want to do it and you pushed this on him

god i fucking despise that the authore made a perfect vanilla into a cliche harem story and ruined it, refuse to accept it as kanon fuck this shit
Threesome with two sisters is just the best.
My dear god, this is/was amazing!
I love the art... this isn't a sketch, it is its own stylw.
Godamnit, it's like a rough sketch. The lines are so thin. I say this artist is a lazy-ass Cuvie (the art similar to Cuvie)
I hope we get a foursome in next year issue!
Now we just need the older sister to join it will be complete
Been a while since I read the whole series. Good to know that the author didn't kill the series.
